intro: Columnea consanguinea, commonly known as the red-stemmed flame vine, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Central and South America. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often cultivated for its ornamental value. Columnea consanguinea is also valued in traditional medicine for its potential therapeutic properties.
